scripts.start:dev: npm run env:dev npm run startLocal
scripts.start:staging: npm run env:staging npm run startLocal
scripts.start:prod: npm run env:prod npm run startLocal
scripts.start_android:dev: npm run env:dev npm run startAndroid
scripts.start_android:staging: npm run env:staging npm run startAndroid
scripts.start_android:prod: npm run env:prod npm run startAndroid
scripts.build_local:dev: npm run env:dev npm run buildLocal
scripts.build_local:staging: npm run env:staging npm run buildLocal
scripts.build_local:prod: npm run env:prod npm run buildLocal
scripts.build_push_docker:staging: npm run env:staging npm run buildPushDocker
scripts.build_push_docker:prod: npm run env:prod npm run buildPushDocker
scripts.build_android:staging: npm run env:staging npm run buildAndroid
scripts.build_android:prod: npm run env:prod npm run buildAndroid
scripts.startAndroid: npm run buildLocal:dev & npx cap sync & cd android & gradlew assembleDebug & gradlew installDebug & cd ..
scripts.startiOS: npm run buildLocal:dev & npx cap sync & npx cap open ios
scripts.build: npm run copyPublic && cross-env CI=false SKIP_PREFLIGHT_CHECK=true GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=true react-scripts --max_old_space_size=4096 build && npm run addPreloadLinks
scripts.buildLocal: npm run auditFix & npm run test & npm run build
scripts.buildPushDocker: npm run buildLocal & cross-env-shell docker image build -t $DOCKER_IMAGE . -f Dockerfile.local & cross-env-shell docker push $DOCKER_IMAGE & cross-env-shell docker image rm $DOCKER_IMAGE
scripts.buildAndroid: npm run buildLocal & npx cap sync & cd android & gradlew bundleRelease & cd app/build/outputs/apk/release & cross-env-shell jarsigner -keystore ./../../../../../../.keystore -storepass $ANDROID_KEYSTORE_PASS app-release.aab $ANDROID_KEYSTORE_ALIAS & cd ../../../../../../
